mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, NAME, NICKNAME, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
